hero.title: Weaving Excellence in Every Stitch: Your Premium Apparel Partner
hero.description: We specialize in crafting premium apparel with meticulous attention to detail, delivering excellence in every product we create. With decades of experience and unwavering dedication, we are committed to meeting your apparel needs with unmatched quality and service.

contact_modal.title: Contact Information
contact_modal.address:
Jl. Raya Kopo KM.7 No.82, Sayati, Margahayu District
Bandung City, West Java 40228, Indonesia

production.heroTagline: Premium garment manufacturing with decades of expertise
production.qualityDescription1: We are dedicated to crafting garments of the highest quality, paying meticulous attention to every detail. Our commitment to excellence ensures that every product we manufacture meets the highest standards of craftsmanship and durability.
production.qualityDescription2: From selecting premium materials to precision stitching, we strive to deliver garments that not only look exceptional but also stand the test of time.

ourProcess.title: Process
ourProcess.subtitle: How we create premium garments from start to finish

0.title: Material Selection
0.description: We use only the finest fabrics and materials for our garments. Each material is carefully evaluated for quality, durability, and comfort before being approved for production.

1.title: Pattern Making
1.description: Our expert pattern makers create precise templates for every garment. These patterns are the foundation of our apparel, ensuring a perfect fit and style for every piece we produce.

2.title: Cutting & Sewing
2.description: Using Juki machines, we cut and sew each piece with precision. Our skilled operators follow strict quality guidelines to ensure every stitch is perfect and every detail is executed with care.

3.title: Quality Control
3.description: Every garment undergoes rigorous quality checks before leaving our facility. Our QC team inspects each piece for stitching quality, sizing, and overall finish to ensure only the best reaches our clients.

stats.title: Numbers
stats.subtitle: Metrics that reflect our commitment to excellence

0.title: Production Lines
0.description: We operate 6 advanced sewing lines, ensuring high-quality garments with every stitch.

1.title: Years of Experience
1.description: Founded in 1991, our company has amassed decades of expertise in the garment industry.

2.title: Skilled Employees
2.description: Our skilled workforce ensures the quality of our garments, maintaining high standards.

3.title: Monthly Products
3.description: We produce thousands of high-quality garments monthly with precision and care.

4.title: International Buyers
4.description: Trusted by over 18 international buyers, showcasing our global reach in premium garment manufacturing.

brands.title: Partners
brands.subtitle: Collaborating with leading global brands to deliver unmatched quality
brands.description: Our partnerships with globally recognized brands demonstrate our dedication to quality and reliability. Over the years, leading names like Jack Nicklaus, Bridgestone, Mizuno, and Srixon have repeatedly chosen us for their projects, a testament to the consistent trust and satisfaction we deliver. We understand the importance of maintaining strong, long-term relationships with our clients, and these collaborations reflect our commitment to excellence and innovation.
